[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Hero – Split” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” disabled=”on” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ background_color=”#1e4a75″ width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ border_width_left=”30px” border_color_left=”#1c3f68″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ text_text_color=”#BED8CB” text_font_size=”18px” header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_color=”#bed8cb” header_letter_spacing=”1px” background_layout=”dark” width=”400px” max_width=”80%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”125px||125px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Survey

Help us understand you better

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.65)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/survey-header.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code admin_label=”Empty Spacer” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Text Centered – with Flag” _builder_version=”4.1″ background_color=”#F0F0F0″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” disabled=”on” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Flag Row” _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/hero-flag.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ custom_padding=”75px||75px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” header_2_line_height=”1.28em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”780px” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Join us for the JCG 2020 Summit

You’ll experience new strategies, social events events, new generation panel discussions, expert advice, networking opportunities, and breakout sessions that will challenge you and leave you with key insights to take back to your firm.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Main Content – with Old Request Form” _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” disabled_on=”on|on|on” disabled=”on” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Text Block – Image” _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Hear from your peers

As a business owner, where do you see yourself in five years? Do you know how much your business is worth? What does your exit strategy look like?
 
We recently conducted a survey asking funeral home and cemetery business owners these questions, and many others. We’ll soon be publishing a report of our findings with insights and takeaways we believe you’ll find incredibly valuable.
 
To receive a free copy of this report, please fill out this form.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_wpt_gravityform gravityform_id=”gf-17″ _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_wpt_gravityform][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Main Content – with Download Form” _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” locked=”off” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ admin_label=”Image – Text – Form” _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/predicting-the-future.png” title_text=”predicting-the-future” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.5″ text_line_height=”2.1em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

What the future holds

As a business owner, where do you see yourself in five years? Do you know how much your business is worth? Do you have an exit strategy in place? We conducted a survey asking funeral home and cemetery business owners these questions, and the results are in. Fill out this form to receive your free report.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_wpt_gravityform gravityform_id=”gf-18″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_wpt_gravityform][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”CTA with Background Image – Global” _builder_version=”4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(30,74,117,0.92)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/services-cta-bg.jpg” global_module=”286″ saved_tabs=”all” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_is_popup=”off” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_dark_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.1″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.johnsonconsulting.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/icon-conversation.svg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ text_line_height=”2.1em” header_2_font_size=”25px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” width=”780px” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Let’s start the conversation

With a clear understanding of where the profession has been, and a compelling vision of where it’s going, we help our clients reach new levels of success. Let’s talk about how we can do the same for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjQ0ODgifX0=@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.1″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#cc7022″ button_border_width=”0px” button_font=”Bitter||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
